title: Did the Democratic Party of the State once celebrate the slogan "The White Panther "?
subtitle: Until 1966, the official slogan of the Alabama Democratic Party showed the loud cock and the sign reading "White Safety."
author: David Emery
vclaim: The official slogan of the Alabama Democratic Party, which was adopted in 1904 and did not replace it until 1966, showed a picture of you shouting and the slogan "White Peace, for the Wright."
